import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { AuthService } from '../../services/auth.service'; import { User } from '../../models/user.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', template: `

`, styles: [` .card { border: none; box-shadow: 0 0.125rem 0.25rem rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.075); transition: box-shadow 0.15s ease-in-out; } .card:hover { box-shadow: 0 0.5rem 1rem rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); } .bg-primary, .bg-success, .bg-info, .bg-warning { background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--bs-primary), var(--bs-info)) !important; } .bg-success { background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--bs-success), var(--bs-info)) !important; } .bg-info { background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--bs-info), var(--bs-dark)) !important; } .bg-warning { background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--bs-warning), var(--bs-danger)) !important; } `] }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { currentUser: User | null = null; constructor( private authService: AuthService, private http: HttpClient ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.currentUser = this.authService.getUser(); // Obtener mensaje de bienvenida del backend this.getDashboardData(); } private getDashboardData(): void { // El interceptor agregará automáticamente el token Bearer this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/api/dashboard/welcome') .subscribe({ next: (response: any) => { console.log('Dashboard data:', response); }, error: (error) => { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error); // El interceptor manejará automáticamente los errores 401 } }); } }
